name: C2I Intel
tag_list: competitor-intelligence, competitor-research, market-research, market-intelligence, industry-research, industry-trends
overview:
At C2I Intel, we develop market-leading solutions designed to help our clients gain a competitive advantage within their industries. Our solutions are affordable and easy-to-use, making them perfect for businesses of any size.

C2I Intel provides real-time competitor and market intelligence from online business news, newswires, and industry authority blogs. Our intelligence is delivered in convenient, easy-to-use formats that free your staff from hours of manual research. Our business intelligence solutions deliver these key benefits:

  • Identify business opportunities

  • Understand future growth drivers and key trends

  • Shorten time-to-market for new product innovations

  • Enable new revenue streams through new product and service offerings

  • Develop emerging market entry strategies

  • Gain actionable intelligence on Existing/New Markets

  • Improve current Web monitoring and mining productivity
